fighter.name: Thorin Ironbeard
fighter.description: A veteran Dwarven Fighter with a strong sense of duty and combat prowess

inventory.equipment_text: Chain Mail, Shield, Longsword, Handaxe (2), Dungeoneer's Pack, Insignia of Rank, Set of Bone Dice, Common Clothes

roleplay.personality_traits: I can stare down a hell hound without flinching. I enjoy being strong and like breaking things.
roleplay.ideals: I face problems head-on. A simple, direct solution is the best path to success.
roleplay.bonds: I would still lay down my life for the people I served with.
roleplay.flaws: I have little respect for anyone who is not a proven warrior.
features_and_traits: Dwarven Resilience: Advantage on saves vs poison
Stonecunning: Double proficiency on History checks related to stonework
roleplay.proficiencies_and_languages: Common, Dwarvish, Smith's Tools, Mason's Tools
roleplay.allies: The Ironbeard Clan, The Stoneguard Regiment
roleplay.backstory: A veteran soldier who served in the Stoneguard Regiment, defending the mountain passes from orc raids.
roleplay.treasure: A family heirloom warhammer passed down through generations.

wizard.name: Elara Starweaver
wizard.description: A brilliant Elven Wizard seeking ancient knowledge and magical artifacts

inventory.equipment_text: Quarterstaff, Dagger, Component Pouch, Scholar's Pack, Spellbook, Bottle of Black Ink, Quill, Small Knife, Letter from a Dead Colleague, Common Clothes, 10 gp

roleplay.personality_traits: I use polysyllabic words that convey the impression of great erudition. I've read every book in the world's greatest libraries.
roleplay.ideals: Knowledge. The path to power and self-improvement is through knowledge.
roleplay.bonds: I've been searching my whole life for the answer to a certain question.
roleplay.flaws: I am easily distracted by the promise of information.
features_and_traits: Arcane Recovery: Once per day when you finish a short rest, you can recover some of your spell slots
Spell Mastery: You have achieved such mastery over certain spells that you can cast them at will
roleplay.proficiencies_and_languages: Common, Elvish, Draconic, Abyssal, Arcana, History, Investigation, Insight
roleplay.allies: The Arcane University, The Starweaver Family
roleplay.backstory: A brilliant young wizard who left the Arcane University to seek ancient knowledge and magical artifacts in the wider world.
roleplay.treasure: A mysterious crystal orb that seems to contain swirling starlight.

rogue.name: Shadow Whisper
rogue.description: A cunning Halfling Rogue with a mysterious past and exceptional stealth skills

inventory.equipment_text: Leather Armor, Rapier, Shortbow, Quiver of 20 Arrows, Dagger (2), Thieves' Tools, Burglar's Pack, Crowbar, Set of Fine Clothes, Belt Pouch with 15 gp

roleplay.personality_traits: I always have a plan for when things go wrong. I am incredibly slow to trust.
roleplay.ideals: Freedom. Chains are meant to be broken, as are those who would forge them.
roleplay.bonds: I'm trying to pay off an old debt I owe to a generous person who helped me when I was younger.
roleplay.flaws: When I see something valuable, I can't think about anything but how to steal it.
features_and_traits: Lucky: When you roll a 1 on an attack roll, ability check, or saving throw, you can reroll the die
Brave: You have advantage on saving throws against being frightened
Halfling Nimbleness: You can move through the space of any creature that is of a size larger than yours
Sneak Attack: Once per turn, you can deal an extra 1d6 damage to one creature you hit with an attack if you have advantage on the attack roll
roleplay.proficiencies_and_languages: Common, Halfling, Thieves' Cant, Thieves' Tools, Disguise Kit, Forgery Kit
roleplay.allies: The Shadow Thieves Guild, The Whisper Family
roleplay.backstory: A former member of a notorious thieves' guild who turned to adventuring to escape their past and make amends.
roleplay.treasure: A mysterious key that opens a lockbox hidden somewhere in the city.
